SELECT a.id AS id, a.wares_name AS waresName, a.spec AS spec, a.shelf_life AS shelfLife, a.unit AS unit, b.supplier_name AS supplierName, a.way AS way, a.wares_type AS waresType, a.custom_code AS customCode, a.bar_code AS barCode, a.en_name AS enName, a.place AS place, a.dishes AS dishes, a.image AS image, a.remark AS remark, a.supplier_id AS supplierId FROM t_pro_wares a, t_pro_supplier b WHERE a.supplier_id = b.id AND a.stat = 1 AND b.stat = 1 AND a.id=#{proWaresDto.id}
